adHeader: Single DAD in need of some work!
adDetails: I'm trying to pay the bills and take care of my 3 year old. i can do any manual labor, mow lawns walk dogs wash cars, i am a single dad so dont email me asking me to clean your house thats not my thing my house is a mess from the boy.i own a full size pickup with a 6.5ft bed to haul or move things or pickup or deliver. NOT into scams like work from home jobs no payroll clerks nothing like that. Give me a call or text my name is Andy . What can I do to help you?707685376one call any time or text me. Oh and if you see this ad I'm still looking. Thank you
